trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting"></xref> events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Udostępnia dane dla <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting"> </xref> i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting"> </xref> zdarzenia <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"> </xref> formantu.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.Action%2A> property to determine which event is occurring.
This enables you to handle multiple event types with one event handler.
trans-unit.target: Dzięki temu można obsłużyć wielu typów zdarzeń z jednej procedury obsługi zdarzeń.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A> properties to determine which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> the event is occurring for.
trans-unit.target: Użyj <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage%2A>i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A>Właściwości, aby określić, które <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>zdarzenia występuje for.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cancel a tab change in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji na temat obsługi zdarzeń, zobacz [zdarzenia](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs"></xref> class.
The property values of the newly created instance are initialized to the specified parameter values.
trans-unit.target: Wartości właściwości nowo utworzone wystąpienie są inicjowane na określony parametr wartości.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> the event is occurring for.
The zero-based index of `tabPage` in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Liczony od zera indeks `tabPage` w <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cancel the tab change by default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Aby anulować zmianę kartę domyślnie; w przeciwnym razie <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating which event is occurring.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> the event is occurring for.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> the event is occurring for.
Gets the zero-based index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage*> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
The zero-based index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage*> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
